creator: manulefou@netscape.net
text:
When starting apache 1.3.27 on AIX 4.3.1.0, I got the following error :

Expected </Directory> but saw </Directory>
apachectl start: httpd could not be started

Looking to http_core.c line 1520, it seems that the "weird" optimization does 
not work in this case (though I successfully used the same Apache delivery on 
Sun, Linux, HP).
